properties.name: async
properties.summary: Whether the request should be done asynchronously

properties.name: attrs
properties.summary: The set of attributes that should be included in matching entries
properties.description:
If no attributes are provided, then the server will default to returning all user attributes. If a specified set of attributes is given, then only those attributes will be included. Values that may be included to indicate a special meaning include the following constants:

  • ALL_USER_ATTRIBUTES
  • ALL_OPERATIONAL_ATTRIBUTES
  • NO_ATTRS

properties.name: attrsOnly
properties.summary: Whether matching entries should include only attribute names, or both attribute names and values

properties.name: filter
properties.summary: The criteria for determining which entries should be returned

properties.name: scope
properties.summary: The range of entries relative to the base DN that may be considered potential matches

properties.name: sizeLimit
properties.summary: The maximum number of entries that should be returned from the search

properties.name: timeLimit
properties.summary: The maximum length of time in seconds that the server should spend processing the search
